game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the town's black market
game.description: Lady Whimsy's grandmother's precious locket has been pilfered, and she needs it back. Investigate the local thieves' guild to get to the bottom of the theft.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a magical amulet, and the gratitude of Lady Whimsy

tasks.objective: Infiltrate the thieves' guild by posing as a new recruit
tasks.description: Meet with the guild's representative, 'Ratcatcher', and convince him that you're interested in joining their ranks.
tasks.location: The Thieves' Guild Hideout (Rathmore's Raggedy Row, 34-12)

tasks.objective: Gather information on the locket's whereabouts
tasks.description: Spend a night in the guild and eavesdrop on conversations to learn more about the locket's location.
tasks.location: Thieves' Guild Common Room (Rathmore's Raggedy Row, 34-12)

tasks.objective: Steal back the locket from the black market
tasks.description: Use your knowledge to infiltrate the black market and retrieve the locket.
